mapper.select: select * from ( select Year_And_Month,MainRevenue from Financial_Interests_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,Total_Sales_Revenue from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,External_Group_Sales_Revenue from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,Total_Vehicle_Production from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,Total_Vehicle_Sales from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,New_Product_Sales_Revenue from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,Specialty_Product_Revenue from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC
select * from ( select Year_And_Month,COGS from Financial_Interests_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,Total_Sales_Cost from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,NetProfit from Financial_Interests_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,ManagementExpense from Financial_Interests_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,RD_Expense from Financial_Interests_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,Manufacturing_Expenses_Month from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,MonthlyRawMaterialInventory from Financial_Balance_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,MonthlyWorkInProgressInventory from Financial_Balance_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,Month_Amount_InStock from Financial_Balance_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,GrowthRate_Inventory_Sales from Financial_Balance_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,TurnoverRate_Receivable from Financial_Balance_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,Capital_Turnover_Rate from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,Inventory_Turnover_Rate from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,Raw_Material_Turnover_Rate from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,InProgress_Turnover_Rate from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,Long_Estimated_Items from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,InProgress_DayRevenue from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,MonthlyInventoryTotalAmount from Financial_Balance_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month,Added_Value_Monthly from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where Year_And_Month like concat('%',#{year},'%') order by Year_And_Month DESC limit 12 ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC
